Followers Pro for IG is more than a regular auto follow extension. It also unfollows accounts you followed before, so your following number stays reasonable.

Get more Instagram followers automatically. 

Grow your account, expand your reach, build your brand and get more leads â€” organically.

- For every 6 users followed/unfollowed, take a 10 minutes cooldown period
